Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the app drawer.
Scroll down to view more apps in the app drawer.
Scroll down to open the VLC application.
Click on "Internal memory" to browse its contents.
Click "Download" to view the contents of the download folder.
Click the orange play button.
Click the "X" icon to close the "Download" folder view and return to the VLC main screen.
Click the "Video" tab to display the video files.
